DatasetContact.PostalAddress: Beechfield House, Carriganore, WIT West Campus, Waterford

DatasetInformation.DataSubject: The records in this Dataset are general marine and coastal records of different taxonomic groups submitted to the National Biodiversity Data Centre.
DatasetInformation.MethodsOfDataCapture: Data collected by different survey methods, but principally by direct field observation.
DatasetInformation.PurposeOfDataCapture: To provide a facility for recorders to contribute to the knowledge of the distribution of coastal and marine species in Ireland and to make their records more freely avaiable.
DatasetInformation.TemporalCoverage: Primarily for capturing new records from 2014 onwards, though it also contains some older records.
DatasetInformation.DataQuality: The bulk of the records contained in this Dataset are from either professional recorders or highly competent recorders working in a voluntary capacity. Not all of the data has been validated.
DatasetInformation.DatasetOriginalFormat: Records submitted via the National Biodiversity Data Centre's on-line recording system.

AttributeInformation.AttributeDescription: Name of administrative county within which the record was made
The name of the Watsonian (botanical) vice-county within which the record was made
A description of the habitat in which the organism was recorded
A measure of abundance of the organism recorded
The sex of the organism if known
The maximum depth of the survey in metres
Details relating to the mehtod used to verify the dive spatial reference
The types of seabed cover present during the survey
Description of the sampling method employed to make the record
Survey name Name of survey if the record was made as part of a specific survey (including collections of casual observations and other loose assemblages of data)
